      Header with summaries will not be supported in a later version. Headers with summaries are not part of Google Design Specs

    • Constructor Detail

      • NavigationMenuItem

        public NavigationMenuItem()
        This empty constructor is to add a divider into your navigation drawer

      • NavigationMenuItem

        public NavigationMenuItem(java.lang.String menuName,
                  java.lang.String tag,
                  NavigationMenuItem.GuiType guiType,
                  boolean selected,
                  OnClickListener onClickListener)
        This is used for a text view that doesn't have an image
        Parameters:
        menuName - The text to display to the user
        tag - The text that is used to determine what menu item was pressed
        guiType - NavigationMenuType.GuiType.TEXTVIEW should be passed
        onClickListener - The specific on click listener for this menu item if not using a generic ListView on click listener (Pass null if using the standard listview onclick listener

      • NavigationMenuItem

        public NavigationMenuItem(java.lang.String menuName,
                  java.lang.String tag,
                  NavigationMenuItem.GuiType guiType,
                  java.lang.String summary,
                  boolean selected,
                  OnClickListener onClickListener)
        This is used for a textview with a summary. I.e. small description about the menu item
        Parameters:
        menuName - The text that is displayed to the user
        tag - The tag that is used to determine the menu item that is clicked
        guiType - NavigationMenuItem.GuiType.TEXTVIEW_SUMMARY should be passed
        summary - The summary description that should be used
        onClickListener - The specific onClickListener to be used. Pass null if using the generic list view on click listener

      • NavigationMenuItem

        public NavigationMenuItem(java.lang.String menuName,
                  java.lang.String tag,
                  NavigationMenuItem.GuiType guiType,
                  int iconRes,
                  OnClickListener onClickListener)
        This is used for standard text views with an icon. An R.drawable should be passed
        Parameters:
        menuName - The text to display to the user
        tag - The tag to determine what menu item was clicked for generic onclick listener
        guiType - NavigationMenuItem.GuiType.TEXTVIEW should be passed
        iconRes - An int resource from R.drawable
        onClickListener - The specific onclicklistener that should be used. Pass null if using the list view onclick listener

      • NavigationMenuItem

        public NavigationMenuItem(java.lang.String menuName,
                  java.lang.String tag,
                  NavigationMenuItem.GuiType guiType,
                  java.lang.String summary,
                  boolean selected,
                  int iconRes,
                  OnClickListener onClickListener)
        This is used for a textview with summary and icon
        Parameters:
        menuName - What should be displayed to the user
        tag - Used to determine what item was clicked from the generic List onclick listener
        guiType - NavigationMenuItem.GuiType.TEXTVIEW_SUMMARY should be passed in here
        summary - The summary to be displayed
        iconRes - The R.drawable int for the icon that should be displayed
        onClickListener - The specific onclicklistener, pass null if using the generic listview onclick listner

      • NavigationMenuItem

        public NavigationMenuItem(java.lang.String menuName,
                  java.lang.String tag,
                  java.lang.String summaryOn,
                  java.lang.String summaryOff,
                  OnCheckedChangeListener onCheckedChangedListener,
                  java.lang.Boolean defaultValue)
        This constructor is used for switches
        Parameters:
        menuName - The text that is displayed to the user
        tag - The tag that can be used for generalised preference click listener
        summaryOn - Summary to be displayed when switch is turned on
        summaryOff - Summary to be displayed when switch is turned off
        The - onpreferenceclick handler to use

      • NavigationMenuItem

        public NavigationMenuItem(java.lang.String menuName)
        This menu item should be used for headers within the menu
        Parameters:
        menuName - The text that is shown to the user

      • NavigationMenuItem

        public NavigationMenuItem(java.lang.String menuName,
                  NavigationMenuItem.GuiType guiType)

      • NavigationMenuItem

        @Deprecated
public NavigationMenuItem(java.lang.String menuName,
                             java.lang.String summary)
        Deprecated. Header with summaries will not be supported in a later version. Headers with summaries are not part of Google Design Specs
        The menu item is used for headers that also show summaries
        Parameters:
        The - text that is displayed to the user
        The - summary or description of the menu header

      • NavigationMenuItem

        public NavigationMenuItem(java.lang.String menuName,
                  boolean isBorderless,
                  OnClickListener onClickListener)
